descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Palatino Linotype][size=4][color=#eeece1][b][i][/i][/b][/color][/size][/font][/center][font=Palatino Linotype][size=4][b][i]
[color=#eeece1]                                                                         [/color][youtube]Y2ZmiCXvQmU[/youtube]


[color=#ff0000][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/9193/?]Now available for Skyrim Special Edition[/url][/color]

[color=#eeece1]No....seriously....where do they come from? Every village in Skyrim has kids running around, there's even an orphanage, where you can adopt these mini-people. So where are they coming from? SPOILER ALERT..... it ain't from the cabbage patch, or the stork. This mod will add several pregnant NPCs to Skyrim.  Some are existing NPCs, others are new, Bandit and Forsworn camps now feature pregnant females as well.  All feature a new "Knocked Up" body mesh, and clothes that have been converted to fit. The body mesh is a highly edited version of the [/color][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36992/?]SevenBase Body Mesh[/url][color=#eeece1] featuring a customized  version of the [/color][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51602/?]Fair Skin Complexion texture set[/url][color=#eeece1], and features BBP. Each new NPC has been placed by hand, meaning no level list have been altered. Existing NPCs have only had their apperances altered, nothing more. This mod does not affect your PC in any way, your installed meshes/textures will remain untouched. Since NPCs were outfitted/placed by hand, no elders/children will appear as pregnant, also this prevents entire camps of pregnant bandits/forsworn.  The converted clothes/armors are marked as playable, so they can be worn by your PC, however they are not intended to be, so you may noticed issues. So far about 30 NPCs are included in the mod, If the mod does well  I may update it to add more. Please leave any feedback/questions in the comments section.[/color]

[b][i][font=Palatino Linotype][size=4][color=#953734][b][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/?][color=#953734]This mod requires XP32 Maximum Skeleton![/color][/url][/i][/b][/color][/size][/font][font=Palatino Linotype][size=4][color=#953734][b][i]   

This mod contains assets used with premission from:
[/i][/b][/color][/size][/font][font=Palatino Linotype][size=4][color=#953734][b][i]

[/url][/i][/b][/color][/size][/font][/i][/b][color=#eeece1]Thanks to [/color][url=https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQ1nSWwpGdWljL96pBQpBxw]Shinji72[/url][color=#eeece1] for the video.[/color]
